highlights: Architected low-level payment integration with per-transaction retry mechanisms and failure-handling paths, achieving 99.8% transaction success rate during transient network errors.
Integrated external payment APIs with automated invoice generation for each completed transaction, eliminating manual post-payment reconciliation steps.
Built Redis-backed idempotency layer at API gateway to exactly-once execution for payment retries under failures.
Enabled direct file uploads using S3 pre-signed URLs, offloading large payload handling from backend services and improving upload reliability under concurrent usage.
Designed OAuth2-based authentication for protected APIs, enforcing role-based access control across user-facing routes.
Developed AWS Lambda compression pipeline triggered on S3 uploads, reducing stored file size by 45% and automatically moving compressed objects to a separate bucket.
